mapper.select: select id, symbol, dataTime as `date`, ma5_volume as ma5Volume, ma5_price as ma5Price, ma10_volume as ma10Volume, ma10_price as ma10Price, ma20_volume as ma20Volume, ma20_price as ma20Price, diff, dea, macd, k, d, j, rsi1, rsi2, rsi3 from mashData where symbol = #{symbol}

select id, symbol, dataTime as `date`, ma5_volume as ma5Volume, ma5_price as ma5Price, ma10_volume as ma10Volume, ma10_price as ma10Price, ma20_volume as ma20Volume, ma20_price as ma20Price, diff, dea, macd, k, d, j, rsi1, rsi2, rsi3 from mashData where symbol = #{symbol} and dataTime BETWEEN #{startDate} and #{endDate}

select id, symbol, dataTime as `date`, ma5_volume as ma5Volume, ma5_price as ma5Price, ma10_volume as ma10Volume, ma10_price as ma10Price, ma20_volume as ma20Volume, ma20_price as ma20Price, diff, dea, macd, k, d, j, rsi1, rsi2, rsi3 from mashData where symbol = #{symbol} and dataTime = #{date}
